for_sales.sales_text:
​18’ 6” Gaff rigged cutter built 1980 by T Heard yard in Mylor, Cornwall.

GRP hull.

Pine mast and spars.

Two sets of foresails - large white plus smaller heads sails of mace colour

Topsail

9hp GM diesel (reconditioned 2014).

Darglow feathering prop

Two bunks

legs for drying out

Mainsail cover

Cockpit cover

Over boom cover

Lying Dartmouth

Watch on YouTube
